survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellness Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and usage patterns of digital wellness tools provided by the company to support mental and physical health.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies to capture accurate data.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: How often do you use the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which digital wellness tools do you find most beneficial? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of tool preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital wellness tools do you find most beneficial? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for future enhancements.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for this question.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by the company? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by the company? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: Have the digital wellness tools positively impacted your overall well-being?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: This question helps measure the perceived impact of the tools on employee well-being.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question.

script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
